full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,'JAM DBYANGS NAG PO'I SGRUB THABS NYUNG DU RNAM GSAL BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @020A *, ,(CES 'JAM DBYANGS NAG PO'I GRUB THABS NYUNG DU RNAM GSAL 'DI NI, DAD PA DANG RNAM DPYOD KYIS MDZES PA'I DPON MO SANGS RGYAS SGROL MA'I ZHAL 'DON DU DZA YA PAndI TA BLO BZANG 'PHRIN GYIS SBYAR BA'O, ,'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA GNYIS PA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING GNAS PAR GYUR CIG ,MANGGA LAm,, ,,)
